titleStmt.title: A Pleasant and excellent dialogue betwixt a learned divine and a beggar. Wherein it is holden furth, that [...] make a full resignation [...] selves, to the will and [...] of God, with all due re[...] and profound humility.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed, and re-printed at Glasgow by Robert Sanders ...,

notesStmt.note: Imperfect: stained, with loss of text, including part of title.
Reproduction of original in: University of Glasgow Library.
